archimate:BusinessService.name: Mobile - 5G Product
archimate:BusinessService.documentation: can be separate charging, TBC if required regressive impact to legacy customers to be considered - more impact to consider in C3 small impact to NaaS and network inbound roaming of 5G to be considered as well 25-09-2020 - Ross requested that 5G specific pricing is required - This is a feature that JP has put forward 09-10-2020 - JP to check with Tony 28-10-2020 - both Kayne and Michael have confirmed this is not required. Feature 39 Speed Based Pricing is the method to market, not network technology specific pricing.
